item.source: How i can set that i can money spawn on my server?

item.title: How i can set that i can money spawn on my server?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Alright, go to your commands… And add this with them…

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
					if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
				}
			}
}
}

… That will make it so you can use ::picup 00995 (Ammount) For your money…

It has to be 00995 because the item ID has to be 5 digits…

If you get errors… Delete the last “}'s” one by one…

Read full topic
item.source: How i can set that i can money spawn on my server?

item.title: How i can set that i can money spawn on my server?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) {
				try {
					int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,12));
					int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));
					if (newItemID <= 20000 && newItemID >= 0) {
						addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
					} else {
						sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
					}
				} catch(Exception e) {
					sendMessage("Cmon Type IT AGIAN ! ");
				}
			}
}
}

If you get 100 errors, delete the “}'s” off the end… NOT ALL… One by one… untill you have no errors.
